tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

actions.name: List floating IPs
actions.description:
Lists floating IP addresses
 associated with the tenant or account.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud
 providers can change these permissions through the
 policy.json file.

actions.name: Allocate floating IP
actions.description:
Allocates a new floating IP address
 to a tenant or account.
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud providers can change
 these permissions through the policy.json file.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

id.description: The ID of the floating IP address.

actions.name: Deallocate floating IP
actions.description:
Deallocates a specified floating IP address.
 
 
 You can use this call to deallocate and delete only manually-allocated
 floating IP addresses. You must manually deallocate
 auto-allocated floating IP addresses before you can delete them.
 
 
 Policy defaults enable only users with the administrative role
 or the owner of the server to perform this operation. Cloud providers can change
 these permissions through the policy.json file.
